prompt_output: An aerial view showcases a vast expanse of agricultural fields dominated by dark green crops arranged in long, parallel rows. A network of light beige dirt roads intersects the fields, forming a grid pattern and dividing the land into numerous rectangular plots. Several small buildings or structures are visible, primarily located at or near the road intersections. One notable cluster of buildings features dark roofs and some red and white elements, alongside a prominent light blue tarp or roof. Another smaller cluster of structures with lighter roofs and some darker patches is present in the lower-middle section. The fields exhibit variations in color and texture, with some areas appearing darker green and others slightly lighter or brownish, suggesting different types of crops or stages of growth. The overall impression is one of organized rural landscape with active farming.

The variations in field color and texture are also noted, providing a comprehensive description of the rural, farmed landscape.
